name: tddhtml5-html-browserhead
keywords: TDD, test-driven development, HTML5, Buster, BusterJS, PhantomJS
author: David Dripps <david.dripps@gmail.com>

scripts.start:
buster server &
sleep 3
./lib/phantomjs/bin/phantomjs ./node_modules/buster/script/phantom.js &
open -a 'firefox' 'http://localhost:1111/capture'
open -a 'google chrome' 'http://localhost:1111/capture'
open -a 'opera' 'http://localhost:1111/capture'
scripts.stop:
kill `ps -ef | grep buster-server | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}'`
 kill `ps -ef | grep phantomjs | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}'`
